QuestData.Title: Into The Wild Green Yonder
QuestData.Description: We will do all that we can to assist you, $n. The proto-brood have volunteered to fly you across the Breach and into Scourgeholme. Rescue any captured Argent Crusaders that you find. Return them immediately to the Vanguard Infirmary, located at the center of this base.$B$BChoose one of the Argent Skytalons in the pen behind me and go!$B$BScourgeholme is located northwest, across the Valley of Echoes, through the great Breach.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue 3 Captured Argent Crusaders from Scourgeholme and drop them off at the Vanguard Infirmary at the center of the Argent Vanguard. Report to Highlord Tirion Fordring should you succeed.
QuestData.CompletionText: With each minute that passes their chance of survival decreases.
QuestData.RewardText: Arthas... He strikes recklessly - without care or caution. We have caught him off guard.$B$B<Highlord Tirion Fordring pauses, lost in thought for a moment.>$B$BWe will bolster our defenses and weather the storm.$B$BHow good are you with a cannon, $n?
